Module info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello

Class HelloUDPNonblockingServer

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello.AbstractServer
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello.HelloUDPNonblockingServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
HelloServer, NewHelloServer, AutoCloseable
public class HelloUDPNonblockingServer extends AbstractServer
Server that uses UDP protocol and non-blocking operations to receive packets and to send them with specified formats.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      CLI for server. Usage: 
      HelloUDPNonblockingServer <port> <threads>
      where port - port to listen, thread - number of query workers
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments
